item.title: Using ElementaryOS Professionally
item.description: My employer agreed on buying me a new and shiny MacBook Pro, so I thought it’s a good time to reflect on my experiences with using ElementaryOS (Freya) professionally daily driver for almost a year. TL;DR I mostly enjoyed the ride. Elementary is fast, polished, functional and has outstanding multi-monitor support. On the other hand, it’s still a Linux and the desktop experience is not nearly as polished as on MacOS and Windows.
